attributes.action: Make Friday a part of the 2 -day school weekend.
attributes.additional_details: Children have lots of stress and sometimes it could be quite hard for them at school so extending the weekend could be a reasonable solution.
attributes.background: Make Fridays a part of the weekend for schools meaning children at school won't have to attend on a Friday.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you want the two-day weekend to include Friday (and therefore not include Sunday) or if you'd like schools to have a three-day weekend. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
